content: work as given for cable kilt socks from *** repeat round 1 twice needle 2 k22 26 28 32 34 sts from spare round 4 * p4 5 6 7 8 k2 p6f k2 repeat from * needles twisted rib socks to end of round needle 3 pick up and knit 12 14 15 17 18 with 3mm needles cast on repeat round 1 twice sts evenly up side edge of heel then knit first 48 60 60 72 72 sts onto one needle these 6 rounds are called cable top patt 7 8 8 9 10 sts from needle 1 divide sts equally between 3 needles work 12 12 24 30 30 rounds more in cable top 19 22 23 26 28 sts on needles 1 and 3 and work 10 rounds in k1 p1 rib patt ** 22 26 28 32 34 sts on needle 2 for instep twisted rib patt next round * k2 1 0 2 4 k2tog k2 4 4 6 5 60 70 74 84 90 sts in total round 1 * k6 p2 k2 p2 repeat from * to end k2tog 7 12 13 10 5 times k6 0 0 1 8 k2tog rounds now begin at centre back heel round 2 * k6 p2 t2 p2 repeat from * to end 1 0 0 0 1 times k2 0 0 0 5 k2tog 7 0 0 0 5 round 2 repeat rounds 1 and 2 until sock measures times k2 0 0 0 4 54 62 66 74 78 sts needle 1 knit to last 3 sts k2tog k1 cable patt needle 2 knit 25 28 31 34 38 cm 9¾ 11 12 13½ 15 in decrease round 1 k8 9 10 13 14 p2 k8 p2 needle 3 k1 sl 1 k1 psso knit to end 4 8 4 8 4 sts evenly across last round k14 20 22 24 26 p2 k8 p2 k8 9 10 13 14 round 3 knit sts from all 3 needles 44 52 56 64 68 sts repeat round 1 once repeat rounds 2 and 3 until 44 52 56 64 68 sts work as given for cable kilt socks from *** round 3 k8 9 10 13 14 p2 c8b p2 rem 11 13 14 16 17 sts each on needles 1 and k14 20 22 24 26 p2 c8b p2 k8 9 10 13 14 3 and 22 26 28 32 34 sts on needle 2 moss st rib socks repeat round 1 7 times place a marker at this point to enable you to count with 3mm needles cast on these 10 rounds are called cable patt the rounds worked for foot from this point 48 56 56 64 72 sts onto one needle cont in cable patt until sock measures foot divide sts equally between 3 needles 25 28 31 34 38 cm knit every round until foot measures work 10 rounds in k1 p1 rib 9¾ 11 12 13½ 15
